data.text:
A few days later... I spotted her heading towards 
the gate with Symboli Rudolf in the distance.
data.processed:
<story>A few days later... I spotted her heading towards 
<story>the gate with Symboli Rudolf in the distance.

data.text:
I know you have a lot of worries, 
but I won't go easy on you.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I know you have a lot of worries, 
<story>but I won't go easy on you.

data.text:
I wouldn't have invited someone like that――hm? 
......
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't have invited someone like that――hm? 
<story>......

data.text:
...? What's wrong, C.B.? 
Is that... the trainer who's so keen on you?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>...? What's wrong, C.B.? 
<story>Is that... the trainer who's so keen on you?

data.text: Yeah. When I had a cold, they were a huge help.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Yeah. When I had a cold, they were a huge help.

data.text:
...Hey, Rudolf. 
How can you run for someone else?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...Hey, Rudolf. 
<story>How can you run for someone else?

data.text:
To think you'd ask such a question. 
Did you feel like running for someone's sake?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>To think you'd ask such a question. 
<story>Did you feel like running for someone's sake?

data.text:
No way. I was just... wondering 
what i twould feel like if that happened.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>No way. I was just... wondering 
<story>what i twould feel like if that happened.

data.text:
――Soon, the race started. 
I hurriedly jumped into the stands 
and clung to the fence.
data.processed:
<story>――Soon, the race started. 
<story>I hurriedly jumped into the stands 
<story>and clung to the fence.

data.text: Hah, hah, hah...!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hah, hah, hah...!

data.text:
(...If I had been a little more flexible, 
I could have immediately thought of making them my trainer.)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(...If I had been a little more flexible, 
<story>I could have immediately thought of making them my trainer.)

data.text:
(...If I had been a little more flexible, 
I could have immediately thought of making them my trainer.)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(...If I had been a little more flexible, 
<story>I could have immediately thought of making them my trainer.)

data.text: (If only I were an Umamusume who could run for a reason...)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>(If only I were an Umamusume who could run for a reason...)

data.text:
Symboli Rudolf took position in front, and the gap 
gradually widened. Eventually, they came to the third corner.
data.processed:
<story>Symboli Rudolf took position in front, and the gap 
<story>gradually widened. Eventually, they came to the third corner.

data.text:
Symboli Rudolf accelerated even more. 
The distance between her and Mr. C.B. widened even more.
data.processed:
<story>Symboli Rudolf accelerated even more. 
<story>The distance between her and Mr. C.B. widened even more.

data.text: Just as I was thinking that.
data.processed: <story>Just as I was thinking that.

data.text:
Mr. C.B.'s body sank deeply. She stepped in deeply, lowered 
her center of gravity, and without even catching a breath――
data.processed:
<story>Mr. C.B.'s body sank deeply. She stepped in deeply, lowered 
<story>her center of gravity, and without even catching a breath――

data.text: (――Ah, but now... that doesn't matter!)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>(――Ah, but now... that doesn't matter!)

data.text: (Now, here, just...!)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>(Now, here, just...!)

data.text: Taaaaah!!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Taaaaah!!

data.text: She leaped out as if leaving everything behind.
data.processed: <story>She leaped out as if leaving everything behind.

data.text: Heh, heh, haha...!!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Heh, heh, haha...!!

data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>...!

data.text: (It's fun, it's fun, it's fun, it's so much fun I can't stand it!)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>(It's fun, it's fun, it's fun, it's so much fun I can't stand it!)

data.text:
(I don't need any more, I don't need any more value...! 
This is it, this is what I need――!)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(I don't need any more, I don't need any more value...! 
<story>This is it, this is what I need――!)

data.text: Taaaahhh――!
data.name: C.B.&Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Taaaahhh――!

data.text: And so, as if entwined, the two of them leaped towards the goal.
data.processed: <story>And so, as if entwined, the two of them leaped towards the goal.

data.text:
――Before I knew it, I had collapsed. 
I didn't know who had won, as only the excitement remained.
data.processed:
<story>――Before I knew it, I had collapsed. 
<story>I didn't know who had won, as only the excitement remained.

data.text:
Hey! What's wrong, are you okay? 
Could it be that you caught a cold...?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: No... The way you're running is too good for me...
choices.processed: <size=33>No... The way you're running is too good for me...</size>

data.processed:
<story>Hey! What's wrong, are you okay? 
<story>Could it be that you caught a cold...?

data.text: Huh? No way, did your legs give out?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Huh? No way, did your legs give out?

data.text: Come to think of it, I thought that the first time I saw it too.
data.processed: <story>Come to think of it, I thought that the first time I saw it too.

data.text:
From the things that can be imagined to the things 
that are said to be unreasonable. 
Mr. C.B. can surpass all dreams.
data.processed:
<story>From the things that can be imagined to the things 
<story>that are said to be unreasonable. 
<story>Mr. C.B. can surpass all dreams.

data.text:
Everything... 
...Oh, I see. You wanted the Classic Triple Crown, 
didn't you?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Everything... 
<story>...Oh, I see. You wanted the Classic Triple Crown, 
<story>didn't you?

data.text:
...It seems she remembered the words I said when I first scouted her. 
However, the "Triple Crown" I mentioned back then was just a metaphor.
data.processed:
<story>...It seems she remembered the words I said when I first scouted her. 
<story>However, the "Triple Crown" I mentioned back then was just a metaphor.

data.text:
I wanted to express the potential I felt in Mr. C.B.... 
So, I conveyed that.

choices.text: You're the Umamusume who shows me dreams.
choices.processed: <size=35>You're the Umamusume who shows me dreams.</size>

data.processed:
<story>I wanted to express the potential I felt in Mr. C.B.... 
<story>So, I conveyed that.

data.text: Not the crown... but a dream?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Not the crown... but a dream?

data.text: Mr. C.B. blinked a few times.
data.processed: <story>Mr. C.B. blinked a few times.

data.text: ...If I run, can you see a dream?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...If I run, can you see a dream?

data.text:
It's not about so-called "achievements" or "results". 
She has a more fundamental, guiding light that leads 
her through life. When I say that――
data.processed:
<story>It's not about so-called "achievements" or "results". 
<story>She has a more fundamental, guiding light that leads 
<story>her through life. When I say that――

data.text:
It's not about so-called "achievements" or "results". 
She has a more fundamental, guiding light that leads 
her through life. When I say that――
data.processed:
<story>It's not about so-called "achievements" or "results". 
<story>She has a more fundamental, guiding light that leads 
<story>her through life. When I say that――

data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>.....

data.text:
...That's amazing. 
You're saying amazing things.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...That's amazing. 
<story>You're saying amazing things.

data.text:
And so, that evening. 
Mr. C.B. invited me to go for a walk.
data.processed:
<story>And so, that evening. 
<story>Mr. C.B. invited me to go for a walk.

data.text:
Hmm! This place feels really good. 
...It's been a while since I've came here with someone.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Hmm! This place feels really good. 
<story>...It's been a while since I've came here with someone.

data.text:
Rudolf told me before that a trainer is someone 
who has something that can't come from me.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Rudolf told me before that a trainer is someone 
<story>who has something that can't come from me.

data.text:
When she told me, I didn't really get it at the time, but... 
When I heard about your dream――I understood.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>When she told me, I didn't really get it at the time, but... 
<story>When I heard about your dream――I understood.

data.text:
..... 
I don't like being restricted.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>..... 
<story>I don't like being restricted.

data.text:
I can't be forced to do it, and I can't be expected to do it. 
I can't run a race for someone else's sake or for some purpose.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I can't be forced to do it, and I can't be expected to do it. 
<story>I can't run a race for someone else's sake or for some purpose.

data.text:
Even now, I still think I can't do it, 
and I'm sure I won't be able to in the future either.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Even now, I still think I can't do it, 
<story>and I'm sure I won't be able to in the future either.

data.text:
But I didn't want to make my trainer have to endure this. 
If I were to form a contract, I wanted for our interests to be aligned.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>But I didn't want to make my trainer have to endure this. 
<story>If I were to form a contract, I wanted for our interests to be aligned.

data.text:
That's why I couldn't decide on a trainer until now. 
But――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>That's why I couldn't decide on a trainer until now. 
<story>But――

data.text:
...If you say you'll just dream for me. 
I feel like it fits perfectly.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...If you say you'll just dream for me. 
<story>I feel like it fits perfectly.

data.text:
Neither of us will hold back. Moreover, it feels really good. 
It's a trainge tailwind that I could never have imagined.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Neither of us will hold back. Moreover, it feels really good. 
<story>It's a trainge tailwind that I could never have imagined.

data.text: Mr. C.B. narrowed her eyes and smiled.
data.processed: <story>Mr. C.B. narrowed her eyes and smiled.

data.text: You can dream for me, and I'll run however I like.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>You can dream for me, and I'll run however I like.

data.text:
If you are happy with the terms, prepare the contract. 
I look forward to working with you.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>If you are happy with the terms, prepare the contract. 
<story>I look forward to working with you.

data.text: Before hearing the answer, she waved her hand lightly and left.
data.processed: <story>Before hearing the answer, she waved her hand lightly and left.

data.text:
――I hurriedly chase after her and pull out the contract from my bag. 
And so, the days of dreaming by her side began.
data.processed:
<story>――I hurriedly chase after her and pull out the contract from my bag. 
<story>And so, the days of dreaming by her side began.
